name: 安东尼娅·弗塔拉斯
name_full: 安东尼娅·弗塔拉斯 Nina Fotaras

last_movies.title: 我不在的时候 第一季

introduction: Nina Fotaras was born as Antonia Fotaras. She is an actress, known for SKAM Italia (2018), The Name of the Rose (2019) and Don Matteo (2000).Speaks six languages: Italian, English, German, French, Spanish and Modern Greek.In both Romulus & Remus: The First King (2019) and The Name of the Rose (2019) she acted speaking exclusively a dead language. In the first she acted in Proto-Latin, while in the latter she acted in medieval Occitan.
